mdRecord.dcterms:title: R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Company Building, exterior|detail view
Reynolds Building
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Shreve, Lamb and Harmon (American architectural partnership, active 1929-1943) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For much of its history the building served as headquarters for R. J. Reynolds Tobacco Company. After a sale to PMC Property Group in 2014, the building went through an estimated $60 million in renovations. In March 2016, The Residences @ the R.J. Reynolds Building, apartments located on the top 11 floors, opened. The first six floors opened as the Kimpton Cardinal Hotel in April. Katharine Brasserie & Bar, a restaurant named for Katharine Smith Reynolds, followed in May. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reynolds_Building [work]
